name: Pensions Governance & Legal AI Knowledge Sources
description: Curated sources for 45Black pensions governance knowledge base - identified 2026-01-15
created_by: Claude Code investigation of Stanford GitLab (redirected to higher-value targets)

sources.name: Stanford CodeX
sources.description: Stanford Center for Legal Informatics - computational law, AI governance, legal analytics

sources.name: Computational Law Foundation
sources.description: AI Agents x Law workshop resources, contract-to-code frameworks

sources.name: TPR DDaT Strategy
sources.description: TPR Digital, Data and Technology Strategy (Oct 2024) - AI initiatives, data standards

sources.name: TPR Data Strategy
sources.description: TPR Data Strategy (March 2025) - data standardisation, regulatory sandbox

sources.name: TPR Trustee Toolkit
sources.description: Official TPR trustee training and guidance resources

sources.name: FinRegOnt
sources.description: Financial Regulation Ontology - FIBO + LKIF integration, OWL ontology

sources.name: Liquid Legal Institute
sources.description: Legal ontologies and knowledge graphs working group - open source resources

sources.name: Lynx Project
sources.description: EU H2020 Legal Knowledge Graph for Smart Compliance Services

sources.name: Stanford NLP Software
sources.description: CoreNLP, Stanza, GloVe - NLP tools for document processing

sources.name: CoreNLP Documentation
sources.description: Stanford CoreNLP documentation - Java NLP suite

sources.name: SPB AI Pensions Analysis
sources.description: Squire Patton Boggs: The Quiet Revolution of AI in Pensions (May 2025)

sources.name: Pinsent Masons AI Pensions
sources.description: AI adoption in UK pensions market - benefits and risks analysis

sources.name: Oxford Semantic Compliance
sources.description: Rules and Regulation Compliance with Knowledge Graphs and AI

categories.name: Research Papers (PDF - manual review)
categories.notes: These are PDFs that may need manual download and processing

sources.name: CFA Pensions AI Report
sources.description: CFA Institute: Pensions in the Age of Artificial Intelligence - Genevieve Hayman

github_repositories.name: Stanford NLP GitHub
github_repositories.description: Stanford NLP Group repositories - CoreNLP, Stanza, etc.
github_repositories.notes: Clone key repos rather than crawl

github_repositories.name: Legal Ontologies Collection
github_repositories.description: Curated list of legal ontologies, data schemes, and knowledge graphs
github_repositories.notes: Reference list - follow links to individual ontologies

archon_crawl_commands.notes: Run these in Archon UI (http://localhost:3737) under Knowledge Base > Crawl Website
